package.description:
Shell package for PCL 1.7.
This assumes you have openni installed.
package.author: teichman

cpp.cflags: -isystem/usr/include/ni -isystem/usr/include/openni -isystem/usr/include/vtk-5.8 $(for dir in `find ${prefix} -name include`; do echo -isystem${dir}; done)
cpp.lflags: -L${prefix}/release/lib -Wl,-rpath,${prefix}/release/lib `for name in ${prefix}/release/lib/*.so; do foo=${name#${prefix}/release/lib/lib}; echo -l${foo%.so}; done`
